text: Captain Tsubasa is a Japanese exclusive 2006 sport video game, developed by Natsume and published by Bandai Namco Games. Based on the anime of the same name, the player can created their own team. And the player can follow the story of Tsubasa Ozora (with the Nankatsu team), where the player can give some commands for the teamates in specifics situation, but player can only control the captain during gameplay. Released in October 19, 2006 for PlayStation 2. Category:2006 video games Category:PlayStation 2 games Category:PlayStation 2-only games Category:Japan-exclusive video games Category:Video games developed in Japan
title: Captain Tsubasa (2006 video game)
